casebody.data:
Paragon Mortgage Company v. E. Douglas Grissette (9496)

O’Connell, Norcott and Landau, Js.

Argued March 28 decision released April 23, 1991 E. Douglas Grissette, pro se, the appellant (named defendant). Alan P. Rosenberg, with whom, on the brief, was Donald G. Rosenberg, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed and the case is remanded with direction to set new law days.
